document.full_text: china has banned foreigners from some restive, heavily tibetan parts of southwestern sichuan province, travel agents said on friday, in an apparent attempt to close off a region shaken by recent clashes with the police.
document.title: china bans foreigners from restive tibetan areas
lines_and_colors: china has banned foreigners from some restive, heavily tibetan parts of southwestern sichuan province, travel agents said on friday, in an apparent attempt to close off a region shaken by recent clashes with the police.
